column2: we finally ask the hostess what the story is
column5: it'll probably be another 20-30 minutes." Wow...sooo....that's at least 5 times the wait you originally promised
column7: did you not think to factor in a pre-event crowd when you started giving wait times? The valet was smart enough to ask if we were headed to the game
column8: so why should you be surprised at the fact that people were on a schedule? All of this while there were multiple clumps of 4 seats available - we weren't waiting for a private table
column9: just anything available. Also worth mentioning that they don't take reservations
column10: so it isn't as if we could have avoided this simply by calling ahead.
